name: Xapalus Deluxe
description:
Xapalus Deluxe, the remastered version of Xapalus!

Xapalus Deluxe is a multiplayer, RTS offensive tower defense game. Build your economy and crush your enemies!

This version has been written from the ground up with stability in mind and user experience in the forefront.

The client is free to play, and you are welcome to play on the public servers. If you would like to host your own private server, you can help support my endeavors by paying $1 for the full version of "Xapalus Deluxe"!

This game was made for May 2015 1GAM.
